meanings.definition: A large-scale merger between two or more companies.
meanings.sent1: The megamerger of the two tech giants created a new industry leader.
meanings.sent2: The megamerger between the telecom companies was announced last week.
meanings.sent3: The megamerger of the toy companies resulted in a giant teddy bear factory.
meanings.sent4: The megamerger of ideas from different departments led to a revolutionary product launch.
meanings.sent5: The megamerger of talents in the music industry produced a chart-topping band.

meanings.definition: The act of combining multiple companies into one entity.
meanings.sent1: After the megamerger, the company had a stronger market presence.
meanings.sent2: The megamerger brought together various expertise under one roof.
meanings.sent3: The megamerger of the ice cream shops resulted in endless flavor combinations.
meanings.sent4: The megamerger of resources led to a more efficient production process.
meanings.sent5: The megamerger of teams improved collaboration and innovation.
